## National Power Flight Academy {style="color: #1e3c72; border-bottom: 3px solid #1e3c72; padding-bottom: 8px;"}

**2024 | Fremont, Nebraska | 9 flight hours | Solo Wings Certified**

Flight training with comprehensive aerodynamics & aircraft systems instruction. Completed solo flight; hands-on pre-flight checks, takeoff, landing procedures. Advanced Private Pilot Certificate pathway.

---

## Aircraft Manufacturing Academy {style="color: #2a5298; border-bottom: 3px solid #2a5298; padding-bottom: 8px;"}

**2025 | Wichita, Kansas | Aerospace Manufacturing Focus**

Specialized systems training • Production workflows & assembly techniques • Manufacturing facility tours • Aerospace engineering from industry professionals • Broadened career perspective to engineering/manufacturing roles in aerospace.

---

## Specialized Undergraduate Pilot Training (SUPT-FC) {style="color: #1e3c72; border-bottom: 3px solid #1e3c72; padding-bottom: 8px;"}

**2025 | Columbus Air Force Base, Mississippi | Competitive National Selection**

Selected from national pool for advanced pilot training orientation • Direct exposure to active-duty U.S. Air Force pilot operations • Advanced flight systems & military procedures • Networked with Air Force pilots • Reinforced U.S. Air Force pilot career commitment.
